titleStmt.title: Spencer redivivus containing the first book of the Fairy queen his essential design preserv'd, but his obsolete language and manner of verse totally laid aside deliver'd in heroick numbers / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
Howard, Edward, fl. 1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
